mapper.update: update dcmemory set danci = #{danci,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mens = #{mens,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jlrq = #{jlrq,jdbcType=DATE}, deletefg = #{deletefg,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, danci, openid, mens, ext1, jlrq, deletefg from dcmemory
